channel.title: Cloth-diapers on Rumor Theory

item.title: cloth diapers 101: Why cloth diapers ?
item.description: Learn about the benefits of ditching disposables, plus how to choose, change and wash cloth diapers. When cloth diapers come to mind, most new moms imagine down-and-dirty diaper origami, complete with cotton squares and safety pins (yes, safety pins)—and that’s how it used to be, back in the day.
